scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && rimraf packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rimraf "packages/*/src/**/*.d.ts" "packages/*/src/**/*.d.ts.map" "packages/*/src/**/*.js" "packages/*/src/**/*.js.map"
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --workspaces --no-git-tag-version && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --workspaces --no-git-tag-version && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major --workspaces --no-git-tag-version && npm version major --no-git-tag-version
scripts.publish:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --workspaces --access public
scripts.publish:domain: npm run clean && npm run build:domain && npm publish -w @janus-validator/domain --access public
scripts.publish:core: npm run clean && npm run build:core && npm publish -w @janus-validator/core --access public
scripts.publish:dsl: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish -w @janus-validator/dsl --access public
scripts.publish:avro: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish -w @janus-validator/avro --access public
